name: Stuffer
0:
”Alexa open stuff locator”
”Alexa ask stuff locator to place my wallet inside the drawer”
”Alexa ask stuff locator to create an event Party and add items cake, cap and confetti, end of list.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stuff locator
des:
Stuffer helps users track their belongings in an intelligent way.
 • Simply ask Alexa to add an item. When prompted later, it would inform the user of the same. 
 • Stuffer maintains a history of each and every item ever stored. This History is the last step resorted to in case of no match is found.
 • Stuffer also tracks items required for an event. Ask stuff locator to create an event and then add items to the list. Later list an event out. 
 • Also, you can individually store these events items and find them too. 

Start now by enabling the skill and adding an item.
